Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Interface VCEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface VCEventListener
Listener interface for View-generated events. VCEvent (Events form Client)
Author:
AndreaAltomare

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void update​(BuildBlockEvent build, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener about the construction of a block.
    void update​(CardsChoosingEvent chosenCards, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener with a Card choosing by the Challenger Player.
    void update​(CardSelectionEvent card, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener with a Card selection by a Player.
    void update​(GameResumingResponseEvent gameResumingResponse, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener with a response about the resuming of the Game.
    void update​(MoveWorkerEvent move, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener about the movement of a Worker.
    void update​(PlaceWorkerEvent workerToPlace, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener with a Worker placement.
    void update​(QuitEvent quit, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener about a Player quit.
    void update​(RemoveBlockEvent blockToRemove, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener about the removal of a block.
    void update​(RemoveWorkerEvent workerToRemove, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener about the removal of a Worker.
    void update​(SelectWorkerEvent selectedWorker, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener about the selection of a Worker.
    void update​(SetNicknameEvent submittedNickname)
    Updates listener with a submitted nickname.
    void update​(SetPlayersNumberEvent playersNumber)
    Updates listener with a number of Players for the upcoming game.
    void update​(SetStartPlayerEvent startPlayer, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener about the chose of Start Player by The Challenger.
    void update​(TurnStatusChangeEvent turnStatus, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener with a request of Turn status change.
    void update​(UndoActionEvent undoAction, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener with a request of action-undo from a Player.
    void update​(ViewRequestDataEvent dataRequest, java.lang.String playerNickname)
    Updates listener with a data request from the Client.
    void update​(java.lang.Object o)
    Updates listener with a (generic) unspecified Event.

      Parameters:
      gameResumingResponse - Event: Response on the game resuming
      playerNickname - Player who generated the event

      playerNickname - Player who generated the event
